title: Handle a Claim Liability Dispute
description: Both drivers in an accident are claiming the other was at fault. The adjuster must determine liability.

tasks.description: Take recorded statements from your insured driver and the third-party claimant.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster obtains detailed, recorded accounts from both parties.

tasks.description: Obtain and review the police report for the accident.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster gets the police report, which includes a diagram and officer's notes.

tasks.description: Based on all evidence, make a liability determination and communicate it to all parties.
tasks.expected_outcome: The adjuster analyzes the evidence and determines liability is 70% on the third party and 30% on the insured, and clearly explains this decision.
